p: Metar Siriwattanasatorn, a Ph.D. degree student, did the whole laboratory study. Pakakrong Thongdeeying helped Metar Siriwattanasatorn in plant extraction and taught Metar Siriwattanasatorn anti-inflammatory assay. Buncha Ooraikul helped Metar Siriwattanasatorn in writing the manuscript. Finally, Arunporn Itharat, the project manager and also the supervisor of Metar Siriwattanasatorn, contributed to submitting all research grants, helped Metar Siriwattanasatorn in all experiments, and evaluated the results on laboratory study, wrote and approved this manuscript.
